plot outline: The government has announced Saksharta Abhiyan (Education for All) in the village of Savargaon, where literate people teach the non-literate how to read and write. But the teachers don't do their part and the village remains uneducated. In the meanwhile, a government officer arrives to assess the situation, but the villagers somehow manage to save the day.
title: Nishani Dava Angatha
plot: The government has announced Saksharta Abhiyan (Education for All) in the village of Savargaon, where literate people teach the non-literate how to read and write. But the teachers don't do their part and the village remains uneducated. In the meanwhile, a government officer arrives to assess the situation, but the villagers somehow manage to save the day.
